habayi oba wagema wishwawidayalayata gihin gutikagena gedara aawa mage gnyathi sahodarayo oya widiyatamayi edath ka gahuwe.ayiya ehema gedaradi kiyannema umbaa oya kiyapu tikama thamayi.ee nisa mata eewa puruduyi.ee wagema mage samawayase kampas yaluwange thibuneth oya wachana set ekama thamayi.ekata innakota un jiwathwenna monawada karanna puluwan kiyana ekata wada hari aasayi oya wachana tika katha kara kara kale kala danna.ee samaharu loku thanathuru wala inne.ee aya rajaye mudalinma ee thanata yanakota mama duk widala wiyadam karagena ethenta giya.ee ayata wada upadhiyak idiriyatath giya.wena sudusukam godakuth hadagaththa.habayi rajayenma igena gaththa ee kisikenekuta thamange mula mathaka na.game duppath iskole thiyanawada danneth na.api gihin eeka suddha pawithra karala enawa.thawa samaharanta thamange duppath guruwaru mathaka na.thawa samahara gamata awith giya kalayak mathaka na.samahara kiyanawa kolambaa wage newayine gama dushkarayine kiyala.mita wadiya oona na machan.umbaa thiyariya katha karanawa.mama meka mage jiwithe athdakala thiyanawa.umbaa thiyariyata anuwa katha kara kara innakota mata jiwithe gatagahaganna mage athdakim ekka prayogika wadapiliwelaka yedila hitapu kenek.
